backend/main.mo: Main actor for a workshop POS backend implementing inventory, service records, customers, transactions, and user profiles with role-based access control (admin/user permissions) and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module that defines the Actor state shape (nextServiceId, nextTransactionId) and a no-op run function that passes state through unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a single feature fix: correcting the admin role/permission check in ProductsPage.tsx and useUserRole.ts that incorrectly blocked admins from adding new products.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and notable changes, serving as a build/documentation reference for the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for a neutral light/dark color theme used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Workshop POS React app, mounting the app at #root and loading the Vite entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up QueryClient, AuthProvider, TanStack Router with all page routes (POS, Products, History, Settings, Users, Service, Reports), and conditionally renders LoginPage when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/customer/Custome: Modal dialog for creating or editing a customer record, including fields for name, phone, discount settings, and a dynamic vehicle history list with add/remove controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainNav.t: Sticky top navigation bar with shop logo, desktop and mobile nav links for all app routes, and a user avatar dropdown with logout, using TanStack Router for active-link detection.
frontend/src/components/pos/CartLineItem: Stub no-op component retained only to prevent import errors; the actual cart UI has been replaced by the TransactionPage cart.
frontend/src/components/pos/TopNav.tsx: Top navigation bar component for the POS app with links to POS, Products, and History pages, plus a logout button and current user display.
frontend/src/components/transaction/Rece: Print-friendly receipt component that renders shop info, transaction details, cart items, and total in a monospace 300px layout using shop settings from a hook.
frontend/src/components/user/Permissions: Renders a checklist of user permissions with checkboxes, and exports constants for all available permissions and role-based default permission sets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Authentication context provider and hook managing workshop users stored in localStorage, supporting login/logout and CRUD operations on users with role migration logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrency.ts: Stub compatibility hook that provides IDR currency formatting and symbol utilities using the Intl API.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomer.ts: React Query hooks for customer data management, providing queries for fetching/searching customers and mutations for upserting and deleting customer records via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity authentication provider and hook built on DFINITY's AuthClient, managing login state, identity persistence, and exposing login/clear functions with status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: React Query mutation hooks for adding, updating, and upserting inventory items via the backend actor, with automatic cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/usePersistedDraft.ts: Stub hook replacing the old draft persistence system, exposing no-op saveDraft and checkout functions for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/usePosDraft.ts: Stub hook replacing the legacy POS draft system, returning a default draft state and no-op action functions to prevent import errors in legacy files.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Stub hook replacing the old products system, returning an empty data array and no-op delete function for backward compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides standalone React Query hooks for CRUD operations on inventory items, customers, transactions, service records, and profit/loss reports, each using the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReports.ts: Exports a single React Query hook that fetches a profit/loss report for a given date range from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useService.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching the service queue, all service records, adding a new service record, and updating a service record's status.
frontend/src/hooks/useShopSettings.ts: Manages shop settings (name, address, phone, greeting, logo) persisted in localStorage, with a global listener pattern to keep all hook instances in sync.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransaction.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all transactions and adding a new transaction via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransactions.ts: Stub hook that returns empty data and isLoading false, replacing the old transactions hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserRole.ts: Fetches the caller's user role from the backend actor using React Query, with retry logic and stale-time configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a warm amber/ochre CSS custom property theme for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerDataPage.tsx: Customer management page supporting search, add/edit/delete via modal, WhatsApp links, and Excel import/export of customer records.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Stub page component that renders nothing, replaced by ReportsPage in the current system.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Inventory management page with a searchable table, add/edit/delete dialogs, CSV import/export, and role-based edit permissions.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login form with username/password fields that calls the `useAuth` hook's `login` function, displaying validation errors and a loading spinner on submission.
frontend/src/pages/PosPage.tsx: Stub/placeholder component that renders nothing; replaced by TransactionPage in the workshop POS system.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Full CRUD inventory management page with search, add/edit dialog, delete confirmation, and CSV import/export, with role-based access control for admin vs. user operations.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Profit/loss report page that aggregates transaction data into revenue, COGS, and gross profit summaries with an itemized sales table and a print button.
frontend/src/pages/ServicePage.tsx: Service management page with a form to create new service records and a queue display, supporting status updates (masuk/selesai) and navigation to the transaction page on completion.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shop settings page allowing users to update store info (name, phone, address), upload/remove a logo (stored as base64), and configure receipt messages, persisted via the `useShopSettings` hook.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionPage.tsx: Checkout/transaction page that handles customer autocomplete, cart management (add/remove/update items), total calculation, and receipt printing via window.print().
frontend/src/pages/UserDataPage.tsx: User management page allowing admins to add, edit, and delete workshop users with role selection and granular permissions via a checklist dialog.
frontend/src/utils/excelUtils.ts: Utility that generates real .xlsx files (Office Open XML/ZIP format) from inventory and customer data using only browser APIs, with no external dependencies.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and hash-cleanup helpers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH color tokens, border radius variables, accordion animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a known bug where the admin role check incorrectly blocks logged-in admin users from adding new products, flagged as a fix request.
